nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story Read-Along Storybook and CD

Solo: A Star Wars Story Read-Along Storybook and CD is a young-readers adaptation of the film Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was written by Nate Millici, illustrated by Diogo Saito and Luigi Aimé, and released on September 4, 2018. The narration is provided by Michael D. Hanks and features dialogue and music from the film.

Return to a galaxy far, far away and relive the adventure of Solo: A Star Wars Story with this exciting book-and-CD set, featuring thrilling sound effects, word-for-word narration, and character voices!
